20110106024505.000|20110106024506.000|CC1|>>> HOW DOES AN IDEA THAT SEEMS 
20110106024506.000|20110106024508.000|CC1|NEAR PERFECT ON PAPER TURN INTO 
20110106024508.000|20110106024508.000|CC1|A LIE?

20110106024511.000|20110106024512.000|CC1|DESPITE THE LIE AND THEN TURN   
20110106024512.000|20110106024513.000|CC1|BACK INTO A LIE?                
20110106024513.000|20110106024514.000|CC1|LET'S START WITH THE IDEA.      
20110106024514.000|20110106024516.000|CC1|TURNS OUT THAT END OF LIFE CARE 
20110106024516.000|20110106024518.000|CC1|IS REALLY EXPENSIVE.            
20110106024518.000|20110106024519.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO ONE STUDY A THIRD  
20110106024519.000|20110106024520.000|CC1|OF ALL MEDICARE SPENDING IS     
20110106024520.000|20110106024522.000|CC1|SPEND IN THE LAST YEAR OF LIFE
